      • ableToMeasureExternalDirectory

        public boolean ableToMeasureExternalDirectory()
        Description copied from interface: BenchmarkDataSource
        Decide if the storage measurement should be done IN the docker container or on external mapped folder on the host.
        Specified by:
        ableToMeasureExternalDirectory in interface BenchmarkDataSource<org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery>
        Returns:
        true if the host could measure size of getMappedStorageDirectoryPath() by it self, or false if host has to measure the getStorageDirectoryPath() IN the docker container.

        Specified by:
        getMappedStorageDirectoryPath in interface BenchmarkDataSource<org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery>
        Returns:
        the absolute storage directory path on the host (outside the TSDB docker container) which is mapped to the storage directory IN the docker container. (docker -v host/dir:/container/dir)
